8308.HK.summary: Gudou Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates and manages hot spring resort and hotel facilities in Guangdong Province, the People's Republic of China. It operates in two segments, Property Development, and Hotel and Resort Operation. The company also develops and sells tourism properties, such as villas, high-rise apartments, low-rise apartments, low-rise studio flats, and commercial units in Gudou Hot Spring Resort, as well as operates entertainment facilities, such as a spa center, a conference center with catering service, the Natural Spring Waterpark, and a karaoke club in the resort. In addition, it provides property management services. The company was formerly known as Gudou International Holdings Limited and changed its name to Gudou Holdings Limited in October 2015. Gudou Holdings Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Jiangmen, China.
